title: Letter Case, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered in chain stitch on plain weave
description: Rectangular letter case in purple silk taffeta, now faded, embroidered with ribbons and colored silks. Inside the double envelope are pouches with flaps, all embroidered in similar floral patterns. Lined with white silk taffeta.

tombstone.epitaph:
Letter Case, late 18th century.Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered in chain stitch on plain weave. 1959-38-1.
